Title: silverstripe/framework sends passwords back to browsers under some circumstances
Description: Under some circumstances a form may populate a PasswordField with submitted data, reflecting submitted data back to a user. The user will only see their own submissions for password data, which is not considered best practice. We are not aware of data leaks to other users, devices or sessions.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.5.5-rc1 before 3.7.0, all versions starting from 4.0.3-rc1 before 4.0.4, all versions starting from 4.1.0-rc1 before 4.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.5.5-rc1, all versions starting from 3.7.0 before 4.0.3-rc1, all versions starting from 4.0.4 before 4.1.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.1.1
